recipesJson.name: Ry4 toffee reserve
recipesJson.author: V1rus
recipesJson.description: This is my take on  butterscotch reserve by glas vapor profile.I believe it tastes even better.enjoy it!

reviews.text: awesome play with the caramel and the toffee!  The creams seem to bring things together.  Can't get enuff of the stuff. Only made a 30 and thats freaking gone!

Mixed this up a couple of weeks ago and totally forgot about it due to working like a Mad man!! Gotta say this recipe is bloody delicious!!!!!! I‚Äôm so glad I I mixed up 120mls. Soon as I saw this recipe I just New it was gonna be a banger. Nice work man üëåüèª
This is so good! Much more toffee, vanilla, and caramel than tobacco, which I love. Great recipe! Will definitely mix this again!
